snippet: The Rangers have dropped 10 of their last 11 playoff games in Washington and have strained to muster any offense.
abstract: New York Rangers have dropped 10 of their last 11 playoff games in Washington and have strained to muster any offense against the Capitals.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers have dropped 10 of their last 11 playoff games in Washington and have strained to muster any offense.

headline.seo: For Rangers, Winning in Washington Has Been Difficult
